LOVAHE/Immersive-Translation

Translation extension for Chromium browsers

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Chrome extension using built-in browser AI for translation
  • bilingual web translator extension and userscript
  • browser extension for translating pages, subtitles, messages, with offline mode, custom translators, personal dictionary, open-source and privacy-focused
  • Browser extension displays translations alongside original text
  • Gradio WebUI for Whisper subtitles, translation, and diarization
  • Web interface for running language models in your browser
  • Browser-based visual editor for WebGL apps
  • Chromium fork with performance tweaks, codec support, and builds for many platforms
  • Fluid simulation that runs in a browser
